title: Build full-stack computer product e-commerce platform

requirements.text: Implement user authentication system using Internet Identity allowing users to securely log in and maintain their session across the platform
acceptanceCriteria: Users can log in using Internet Identity passkey authentication
User session persists across page refreshes
Login state is reflected in the UI (show logged-in user identity)
Users can log out successfully

requirements.text: Create product catalog system for computer products with categories, descriptions, pricing, and product images. Pre-populate with sample computer products including desktops, laptops, components, and peripherals
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores product data including name, description, price, category, and image URL
Frontend displays products organized by categories
Each product shows image, name, price, and description
At least 8-10 sample computer products are pre-loaded
Products include various categories (desktops, laptops, components, peripherals)

requirements.text: Implement shopping cart functionality allowing users to add products, update quantities, remove items, and view cart total. Cart must persist for logged-in users
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart from product listings
Cart displays all added items with quantity and individual prices
Users can update item quantities in the cart
Users can remove items from the cart
Cart shows total price calculation
Cart persists for logged-in users across sessions
Cart is accessible from a dedicated cart page or modal

requirements.text: Build checkout system with Stripe payment integration. Collect shipping address and contact information during checkout, process payment through Stripe, and create order record upon successful payment

quotes: Stripe integration for secure online payments

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page collects shipping address (street, city, state, postal code, country)
Checkout page collects contact information (name, email, phone)
Integration with Stripe creates a checkout session for the cart total
User is redirected to Stripe hosted checkout page
Successful payment creates an order record in the backend
User is redirected to success page after payment
User is redirected to failure page if payment fails

requirements.text: Implement order tracking system showing order history for logged-in users with basic status progression: Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered. Each order displays products purchased, total amount, order date, and current status

quotes: Basic order tracking with status updates (Pending → Processing → Shipped → Delivered)

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores orders with status field supporting Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered
Users can view their complete order history
Each order shows order number, date, items purchased, total amount, and current status
Order status is visually indicated with appropriate styling
Orders are sorted by date (most recent first)

requirements.text: Display contact details in the footer: Phone number 9315906829 and email address panerudaya11@gmail.com. Make email and phone clickable (mailto and tel links)

quotes: contacts details are 9315906829 and mail id is panerudaya11@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays phone number 9315906829 with tel: link
Footer displays email panerudaya11@gmail.com with mailto: link
Contact details are clearly visible and properly formatted
Links are functional on both desktop and mobile

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme using warm earth tones with terracotta accents and clean modern typography. Apply consistent styling across all pages including product cards, cart, checkout, and order tracking interfaces
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm earth tones (terracotta, sand, warm grays) consistently
Typography is modern and readable across all components
Visual hierarchy clearly distinguishes headings, body text, and interactive elements
Design feels cohesive across products, cart, checkout, and order pages
Interactive elements have clear hover and active states

constraints: Use Internet Identity for user authentication (no third-party auth providers)
Backend must be implemented as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui/*
nonGoals: Advanced search and filtering beyond basic category organization

required: Computer desktop setup hero background image with warm lighting (hero-computers.dim_1920x800.png)
Shopping cart icon in terracotta color (cart-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Desktop computer product photo on white background (desktop-pc.dim_400x400.png)
Laptop computer product photo on white background (laptop.dim_400x400.png)
